item.title: Bloody Mary
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 45 ml vodka
  • 90 ml tomato juice
  • 15 ml lemon juice
  • 2 dashes Worcestershire sauce
  • 2 dashes hot sauce
  • pinch celery salt
  • pinch pepper
  • celery stalk
  • lemon wedge

Instructions

  1. Build in highball glass over ice.
  2. Garnish with celery and lemon.
